data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Duwal, Ram Keshari, Schwartz, Michael D., Yasunaga, Tomohide (2019): A new species of the plant bug genus Rubrocuneocoris (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Miridae: Phylinae) from Vietnam. Zootaxa 4652 (1): 165-173, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4652.1.10|4 occurrences
